website_summaries.verdict: A great entry-level racing drone that's perfect for beginners who want to try one out before making a big investment.
pros: Take off and land with the press of a button

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for kids and anyone learning to fly!
customer_reviews.text: I got this drone without the camera, because I wanted a line of sight flier my 5 yo could fly too. This is a great drone!!! Awesome for learning how to fly. The altitude hold works great, and this is a very stable drone! I was surprised at the yaw (spin) rate was good even in the first speed. Great battery life makes this drone so fun! Flying outside, it did great even in 7+mph winds. A little big to fly inside, but with the prop guards you may be able to. Overall, this is a fun entry level drone for kids and anyone learning to fly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great starter drone
customer_reviews.text: Really fast and stable drone for its size and price. I have a DJI Mavic as well and sometimes I enjoy this drone more because it’s almost as fast and I’m not nervous to lose it. Only doing three stars because I can’t find replacement rotor guards or motor gears and have stripped teeth in less than two months. Not a huge deal, but I’d rather repair it than buy a whole new one
customer_reviews.author: Samwise

customer_reviews.title: One of the best toy drones I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginner drone. I'm far past a beginner but need something for my 6yo and this drone is great. Only limitation is that it you cannot unlock manual acro mode even though the drone is capable of doing programmed flips.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: nice design  easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of it. Nice design and easy to use. As for flying, these little guys are stable, quick, responsive, and easy to fly, even for a newcomer like myself to get the hang of.
customer_reviews.author: DingFeng Zhang

customer_reviews.title: ooops!
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a durable, nice product. My kids were too anxious to use it and didn’t take the time to read instructions and get acquainted with how to operate it. Let’s just say it’s probably somewhere in the next state by now 🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: mom of four

customer_reviews.title: Cheap...but ok
customer_reviews.text: This thing was ok but I had to return the original, then the replacement. It’s cheap.
customer_reviews.author: LukeB

customer_reviews.title: Good drone
customer_reviews.text: Really great drone for the price remote control sucks though it gets stuck. Other than that, handles great and great time
customer_reviews.author: Brian Palmieri

customer_reviews.title: Great Drone as gift for boys
customer_reviews.text: This drone comes with a fancy gift box so if you are looking for a birthday gift for teen boys, I will highly recommend since my cousin loves it so so much!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable remote control
customer_reviews.text: I looked at few drones, all the remote controls are small, I like this one has bigger remote, it's more comfortable to hold. The one key return and auto hover are my favorite functions. The 3D rolling function makes it really fun to fly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: This drone is a great gift for kids! The design is nice and it’s very easy to control. Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Dont loose the DRONE!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it !! For 5mnt or lees ! I lost it on the air!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toy , the kid has a lot of fun
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the birthday present I gave him. This is great for novices. He tried it a few times and now he is free to control the flight.
customer_reviews.author: Octavia

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It's fun and easy to control. I love it. It's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: hanrui

customer_reviews.title: remote control lost signal with drone, drone crashed and lost
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter did her research before choosing this drone for Christmas. She got it Christmas Day, we charged it for several hours then took it outside to fly it. She had flown a drone before so she was able to get it up and flying, when it got high enough she pressed the one key returned button and the drone would not returned, she tried bringing the drove down but it seemed like the drone lost signal with the remote. The drone ended crashing into a tree about 80 feet high. We were not able to retrieve the drone. Not sure why the remote did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Hoebel

customer_reviews.title: Gear drone, wore out after a year.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fly drone that is great for kids. I gave this to my 6 yo for xmas 2018. It is now Feb 2020 and the drone has worn out. The small gears on two of the motors have lost teeth and one rotor no longer turns properly because of that. My son is sad. I have searched for replacement gears, but no sucess so far. Btw, replacing the blades can be a bit challenging.
customer_reviews.author: John N. Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: This drone rocks. It has the ease of use and performance for any skill level
customer_reviews.text: I received this drone as a gift and was so impressed with its list of features and outstanding performance, that I looked it up so I could leave a review. It has every feature that a newbie could want, including 3 speed settings, auto hover and altitude control, along with the performance to satisfy the more experienced hobbyist. It is very responsive, relatively fast and handles light winds quite well. Dollar for dollar, it is one of the best values around
customer_reviews.author: william hemmingway

customer_reviews.title: Range sucks
customer_reviews.text: For a brushed drone it was fast but control range sucks I lost mine the 2ed day
customer_reviews.author: BUBBIE HOLMES

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought a child to like before! Two kids fighting! Now I bought another one! This one has more capacity than the previous one! A good charge can play more than ten minutes! like
customer_reviews.author: L J

product_meta.title: REMOKING RC Drone Racing Quadcopter Headless Mode 2.4GHz 360°flip 4 Channels Altitude Hold Indoor and Outdoor Sport Game Good for Children and Adult as Gifts 12mins Long Flight Time - Black
feature_bullets: ✔️INNOVATIVE DESIGN: Lightweight body, Powerful motivation, Stable flight condition, Up to 12 minutes flight time. It is a good choice for you
✔️6-AXIS GYRO QUAD-ROTORCRAFT FLIGHT: Strong stability, can easily implement various flight movements, stronger wind resistance, easier to control
✔️ONE BUTTON TO TAKE OFF/LAND: Press one of the buttons on the remote to achieve automatic take-off and landing, ideal for kids and new players. Suitable for indoor and outdoor
✔️FLEXIBLE CONTROL MOVEMENT: R820 Racing Drone 4 channel design, ranging from Forward, backward, left/right fly, left/right turn. This amazing feature gives you more fun
✔️CAN BE PRESENTED AS A HOLIDAY GIFT TO CHILDREN OR FRIENDS: Comes with a detailed manual that provides Accurate Instructions about its Function and Usage
